q.quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
q.author: Joyce Brothers

q.quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
q.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

q.quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
q.author: Joyce Brothers

q.quote: God will not look you over for medals degrees or diplomas, but for scars.
q.author: Elbert Hubbard

q.quote: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
q.author: Neil Armstrong

q.quote: Man is still the most extraordinary computer of all.
q.author: John F. Kennedy

q.quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
q.author: Shiv Khera

q.quote: God will not look you over for medals degrees or diplomas, but for scars.
q.author: Elbert Hubbard

q.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
q.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

q.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
q.author: Elbert Hubbard

q.quote: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
q.author: Jim Rohn

q.quote: I have a Father's Day every day.
q.author: Jim Rohn

q.quote: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.
q.author: Elbert Hubbard

q.quote: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.

q.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
